title: The maximum permissible TDR that can be utilised on any plot shall be as per regulation 30(A) and/or as specified in these Regulations
clause_text: The maximum permissible TDR that can be utilised on any plot shall be as per regulation 30(A) and/or as specified in these Regulations. .
section: .1 Utilization of Transferable Development Rights (TDR ) and Road Width Relation will be govern by regulation 30 (A) subject to following notes:-

source_pdf.text_snippet: The maximum permissible TDR that can be utilised on any plot shall be as per regulation 30(A) and/or as specified in these Regulations. .
